content:
path /v3/blockchain/marketplace/listing/chain/contractAddress/recipient
operationId GetMarketplaceFeeRecipient
parameters
description Blockchain to work with
in path
name chain
required True
schema
type string
description Contract address
in path
name contractAddress
required True
schema
type string
summary Get the recipient of the NFT marketplace fee
description 1 credit per API call
Get the recipient of the NFT marketplace fee
This API is supported for the following blockchains

BNB Smart Chain
Celo
Ethereum
Harmony
Klaytn
Polygon
Solana in alpha
responses
200
schema
type object
address
type string
description Address of the marketplace fee recipient
description OK
